questions.quote: We were walking down the block right by your house and I was just about to break up with him then all of a sudden he started to twitch.
Alright, what's the difference. What are we gonna do now? He won't take our calls, we can't get into his office...
No problem.  There's no problem.  She just owes me ten dollars, that's all.
Here's my card. I'm in real estate, so, if you're ever looking for something bigger, something nicer..  ..maybe not right now. Anyway..
Yeah, I wrote some jokes to the show and they gave me two tickets.
Look, it's a very awkward situation. I don't wanna be presumptuous.
You know I'm a little hungry. You wouldn't happen to have any of that mango left?
Yes, George, come in, come in. George, word up's you've been cracking under the pressure. Can't cope, can't stand the heat. Spit the bit.
And when is Brother Costanza planning on telling Mother Costanza?
I mean, you know, I've never been so insulted in my entire life. There's something really wrong with this man. He is a Soup Nazi. What? What is that?
